ComicInfo.Summary: Mini-Marvels creator CHRIS GIARRUSSO returns with a brand new G-Man miniseries! When pieces of G-Man’s magic cape fall into the wrong hands, things quickly spin out of control. G-Man and his friends must battle to recover the pieces, and this time the bad guys have the same power as G-Man! Also included, back-up features by a bunch of other cool writers/artsits.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 11:08:46. [CVDB166769]
ComicInfo.Writer: Art Baltazar, Brian Smith, Chris Eliopoulos, Chris Giarrusso, Franco Aureliani, Gregg Schigiel, Jacob Chabot
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Smith, Chris Eliopoulos, Chris Giarrusso, Franco Aureliani, Gregg Schigiel, Jacob Chabot
ComicInfo.Inker: Brian Smith, Chris Eliopoulos, Chris Giarrusso, Franco Aureliani, Gregg Schigiel, Jacob Chabot
ComicInfo.Characters: Baxter, Billy Demon, G-Man, Great Man, Sparky, Tanman, Tony
